list.title: ColumnConfig
list.description: Represents the configuration for a column in a database table.

list.title: ConnectionParameterError
list.description: Error thrown when connection parameter is missing

list.title: ConstraintConfig
list.description: Represents the configuration for a constraint in a database table.

list.title: DB
list.description: Used to initialize the pg-promise database connection and repository instances.

list.title: ForeignKeyConfig
list.description: Represents the configuration for a foreign key in a database table. Use {@link ConstraintConfig} instead.

list.title: Model
list.description: Creates an instance of Model.

list.title: Model#columnset
list.description: Returns the column set object for the model

list.title: Model#count
list.description: Counts the number of records in the database table

list.title: Model#createTableQuery
list.description: Creates the SQL query to create the table based on the schema provided

list.title: Model#delete
list.description: Deletes records from the database table

list.title: Model#drop
list.description: Drops the database table

list.title: Model#init
list.description: Creates the database table based on the schema provided

list.title: Model#insert
list.description: Inserts a record into the database table

list.title: Model#select
list.description: Selects records from the database table

list.title: Model#selectOne
list.description: Selects a single record from the database table

list.title: Model#truncate
list.description: Truncates the database table

list.title: Model#update
list.description: Updates records in the database table

list.title: RepositoriesParameterError
list.description: Error thrown when repositories parameter is missing or invalid

list.title: TableSchema
list.description: Represents the schema configuration for a database table.

list.title: UniqueConstraint
list.description: Represents the configuration for a unique constraint in a database table. Use {@link ConstraintConfig} instead.
